# The `M68kCollapseMOVEM` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This Pass first walks through all the MOVEM instructions that are chained together and record each of the instruction&#39;s properties like register mask and data access type into a <code>MOVEState</code> instance. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This Pass first walks through all the MOVEM instructions that are chained together and record each of the instruction&#39;s properties like register mask and data access type into a <code>MOVEState</code> instance.

Then we perform reduction / collapsing on this <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-m68kcollapsemovempass-cpp-/movemstate">MOVEMState</a></code> representation before creating a new <code>MOVEM</code> instruction based on the collapsed result, as well as removing redundant <code>MOVEM</code> instructions.

Definition at line 157 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/m68k/m68kcollapsemovempass-cpp">M68kCollapseMOVEMPass.cpp</a>.
